reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here 3 nights at this hotel in July, along with a motorcycle tour group. The were friendly throughout our stay and extremely helpful. The rooms were spacious, clean and very comfortable. The restaurant serves the most splendid dinners we had in our entire journey with CIMT. I loved hiking and the Col Alt cable car was just behind the hotel. Shops could be found directly in front of the hotel. We walked everywhere and saw most of Corvara. I loved every minute of our stay in Posta Zirm. We didnt have a chance to visit the Wellness centre with our busy schedule but will do so the next trip.
reviews.title: Fabulous!

reviews.text: We stayed for 7 nights in a deluxe room during ski season. Overall, Posta Zirm is a very nice property -- great public areas, one of the best spas I've seen at a ski resort (multiple saunas and steam rooms at various temperatures and a full size pool), and a very good restaurant. Breakfasts were excellent with plenty of choices; dinners were good though the food was often heavy and quantities served too large. After a week we were ready for a change.
reviews.title: Nice property with great spa
